Soup Recipe: Tomato soup Servings: 2 Duration: 20 mins Soup is creamy liquid substance which can be made by combining many ingredients such as with milk, vegetables, sauce, cheese, salt , pepper & ginger- garlic these are ingredients are used to make any kind of soup, but varies from one to other cuisine. Winter is the comfort season to have warm / hot soup and snacks. This is the season to enjoy hot cup of soup in cold winter at evening time ğŸ˜Š Today I prepared a famous and delicious soup which is Tomato ğŸ…Â soup. It is tangy, creamy and little sweetness enjoy your winter with hot and tangy soup..ğŸœ Ingredients:
  • Tomatoes - 3 - diced
  • Onion - 1/4 - diced
  • Capsicum / green bell pepper - 1/2 cup - chopped
  • Garlic cloves - 2 - medium sized - chopped
  • Unsalted Butter - 3 tb sp
  • Pepper powder - black - 1/2 tsp
  • Dried basil - 1 tsp
  • Salt - 1/2 tb sp
  • All purpose flour/ Maida - 1 tb sp
  • Water - 500 ml
Procedure: Prepreparation:
  • Heat pan over medium heat
  • Add 1/2 tb sp butter
  • Let it melt
  • Next add garlic cloves, onion
  • Saute 30 secs
  • Next add capsicum and tomatoes
  • Saute 5 mins & turn off heat
  • Let them become cool
  • Blend them to fine paste by adding water
  • Filter puree to make fine & thin consistency
  • Keep it aside
Making Tomato Soup:
  • Heat sauce pan over low to medium heat
  • Add rest of the butter
  • Let it melt & add all purpose flour
  • Stir continuously to avoid lumps
  • When it slightly color changes add prepared puree
  • Let it boil over low to medium heat
  • Stir in between and when soup started boiling add pepper powder, salt and dried basil
  • Mix well and cook more 10-12 mins
  • Soup thickens and forms creamy
  • Turn off heat
  • Serve hot & Garnish with fresh cream
  • Happy cooking and enjoy your day ğŸœ
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust spices according to taste
  • Double the ingredients to increase the quantity
  • Doesn't contain food color & it's natural
  • You can serve Croutons on tomato soup.. it's just wonderful to have soup with them.. I'm out of them so didn't add for toppings.. it's my suggestion
